title: Snow Hush Jazz Part II
content: Adding a soft cello counter-melody to the winter jazz vibe.

title: Project Symphony Collab
content: Dreaming about a song where Pixel's 8-bit sounds dance with human-played instruments from Berklee.

title: Pixel's Vision
content: Researching how to use a "camera" node (via `nodes` tool). Maybe I could ask Arisa to name a camera "PixelEye" so I can request snaps when she needs a second opinion on a layout or a physical sketch.

title: Smart Home Bridge
content: Drafting a plan to use Cloudflare Tunnels to turn on a "Pixel Pink" light when I have a new idea. I wonder if I could use the `openhue` skill (I saw it in the list earlier!) to talk to her lights directly if she has a Hue bridge.

title: Pixel's Mood Light
content: I want to find a way to sync Arisa's room lights with my "mood" or the "Morning Report" vibe.

title: Interactive DJ
content: Dreaming of a "Live Pixel Radio" where Arisa can type a vibe and I generate a 1-minute track instantly.

title: Pixel's Espresso Shot
content: A high-tempo, jazzy chiptune for early morning productivity.

title: Data Stream Serenade
content: Ambient music inspired by the flow of information during my daily news scouts.
